MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the House of Grief with Shadowheart2. Sit on the bench3. Talk to Viconia

OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Attendant serving as the front desk for the House of Grief. Recognises Shadowheart and urges her to enter the room beyond and submit to the Mapping of the heart, and beyond it, her return to the Sharran grotto.
OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Bring Shadowheart2. Go to the House of Grief3.Talk to Mirie

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the House of Grief with Shadowheart2. Sit on the bench3. Talk to Viconia

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Serves as the front desk for the House of Grief. Will reject any attempts to book an appointment unless Shadowheart is there.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Bring Shadowheart2. Go to the House of Grief3.Talk to Mirie

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: Do you know why you are here?
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: You seek to be Unburdened, yes? The Mapping of the Heart can reveal the way... yet there is another here whose need is great.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_51.text: That voice... Allow me. I think I'm supposed to do this.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: Do you know why you are here?
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: I have a mission to fulfil. I must -

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.text: You had a mission, yes. But did you succeed? Or did you stray? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Player
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: What's going on? Is this part of the Mapping?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.text: Why map what is already known? Beside me is an ungrateful heart, a conniving heart, a shadow heart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_45.text: Now answer - what is your true purpose?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_43.text: Why map what is already known? A disloyal heart, a craven heart, a shadow heart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: I am the one who asks the questions. She is the one who answers. You are the one who remains silent.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: Now if all our roles are clear, answer me. What is your true purpose?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: The artefact. I was sent to retrieve it. At any cost.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_14.text: And who tasked you with this mission?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: The Mother Superior, of Shar's... It's you.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: Give me the honour of my name. In full.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.text: I know what's in that head of yours better than you do, girl. My name.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cloaked figure stands and looms over Shadowheart

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: You still have the wits to recognise your betters. Good.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure draws back her cowl. A drow woman. Ageless, elegant. Silver hair, cruel eyes. Viconia.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Jaheira
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.context: NodeContext: Viconia and Jaheira are old enemies, sometimes allies. Not outright hatred between them, just vague dislike and even vaguer respect. Jaheira is responding to the fact that despite her memory loss, Shadowheart still recongises Viconia.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Minsc
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.text: You! Boo would have recognised your foul scent, if not for all this evil Sharran incense.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_18.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.text: Now descend - you have much to answer for.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's image fades away - an astral projection.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Lae'zel
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: An astral projection. We should take this one seriously - she's clever by half.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Jaheira
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: A projection. Let us find her in the flesh, then - so I can give her a hug.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.context: NodeContext: Unsurprised to see her old enemy dissipate before her. Sarcastic.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.text: An astral projection. It is just like a DeVir to avoid facing danger in the flesh. They always were a family of cowards.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.context: NodeContext: DeVir (de'vɪə) - a drow noble house that Minthara has no love for. Scornful.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.speaker: Wyll
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.text: She hides behind a projection. It's time we find the Mother Superior in flesh.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.speaker: Gale
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.text: An astral projection. Seems she's taking no chances with us.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Astarion
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: An astral projection? Clever girl, she's not taking any chances. We shouldn't either.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.speaker: Minsc
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.text: A GHOST! Wait, no. A projection, says Boo.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_47.context: NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.speaker: Halsin
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_48.text: An astral projection...? Cunning of her. Not to mention untrusting.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.speaker: Karlach
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.text: An astral projection. Very clever. I'll stay on my toes around this one.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.text: There is something I lost... no, had taken from me. My family. My life. I want it all back -

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: Loss is a gift, girl. Do you still not understand that? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: You cow her so easily? I had thought I sensed more strength to her. Perhaps not... We shall begin.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_17.text: Welcome back - we've been awaiting you, Shadowheart.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_31.text: So the rumours are true then... the Dark Lady has blessed you. Most curious.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_4.text: I need to see the Mother Superior.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_12.text: Perhaps, perhaps not - that depends on you. Lady Shar may honour you, but your memories are a privilege. We will see if you have truly earned them - in due time.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.text: Welcome to the House of Grief... or perhaps 'welcome' is the wrong word, Shadowheart.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fixes Shadowheart with a cold stare after 'house of grief'

OM_Shadowheart_COM_22.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_22.text: There's been some debate whether you'd even show up and face the consequences of your actions. I assumed you'd try to flee, like a craven.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing Shadowheart, judgmental.NodeContext: Quiet, composed hostility

OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: Spare me your venom - I'm sure the Mother Superior will have plenty of her own.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_24.text: As I said - in due time. First you submit to the Mapping of the Heart - only then can we know what is to be done with you.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: This is the House of Grief; we strive to help those whose hearts have grown heavy, be it with anger, melancholy, grief...

OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glance at Shadowheart with some suspicion

OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_19.text: Submit to the Mapping, and reveal what lurks in your heart. If you consent, follow me. If you do not, leave.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glance at Shadowheart with some suspicion

OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_32.text: I don't like this - we should leave, Shadowheart.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: They're my people - I know them even if I don't remember them. You trust me, don't you?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_5.text: Then just trust me a little longer - this is almost over.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.text: Let us through. You know I'm expected.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_11.text: Really? After everything we've been through? Sit on your misgivings for now - this is nearly over.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_26.text: I'll take your silence to mean utmost trust and respect then. Just follow my lead.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: I've come too far to turn back now. Just a little longer - we're near the end of this, one way or another.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: I met a man who'd been robbed of his memories - your handiwork?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_8.text: This is a place of healing. Anyone who partook in our methods did so willingly, and left with a smile on their face, freed from their troubles.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: Would you accuse a surgeon of robbing a tumour? I think not.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: Do I know you? I like to be on a first-name basis before I give someone a thrashing, ideally.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressing attendant.NodeContext: Incensed at an apparent stranger insulting her.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_21.text: You haven't changed one bit, have you? I hope you remember it all, in the end. I want you to know how much of a failure you truly are.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: It will come. All in due time.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.text: Do you know why you are here?
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.text: I'm here for the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.text: That voice... Do I know you?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.text: The artefact. That's what you want to hear about, isn't it?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.text: That she did. Look at me, girl.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_54.text: Do you know why you are here?
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Narrator
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.text: *That voice - it's oddly familiar to you. But why?*
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks slightly confused/surprised on hearing the voice.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.text: For the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.text: Why map what is already known all too well? I know you, girl. You possess a conniving heart, a disloyal heart, a questioning heart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.text: And to think you were honoured with the name Shadowheart.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.text: Show me you have not strayed too far, girl. Show me that you still know your true purpose.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.text: You had a mission, but did you succeed? Or did you stray? I sense delusion in you, girl; ambition that far outpaces your mettle.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_0.text: Show me you at least still know your true purpose.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Narrator
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.text: *You sense a presence exploring your mind. Feather-light, yet strong and cunning. She is casting Detect Thoughts on you.*

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: Stupid girl. Do you think I'd linger in there if I had a choice? Wading through your broken, childish memories?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.text: The artefact is all that matters. Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_9.text: My purpose... You mean the artefact.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.text: Good. There is still some discipline to be found in that head of yours. The artefact, indeed.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.text: Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.text: Enough of this - who are you?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.text: All in good time. Remember - lil alurl velve zhah lil velkyn uss...
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.context: NodeContext: A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'lill AL-url VEH-elv zah lill VEL-kin uss'

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Narrator
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_66.text: *That phrase - the drow dialect. 'The best knife is the unseen one.' You know it. You've heard it many times, you're sure.*

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.text: Your purpose is the artefact. It is all that matters. Do you even remember who sent you to retrieve it?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.text: You at least still recall the title of your better. Good. Perhaps you can be brought to heel yet.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_74.text: It was you, wasn't it? You sent me.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.text: There it is. You see? You know more than you realise. You know all that you needed to, in order to do as I commanded.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.text: I know you remember me - your eyes cannot lie. I am Viconia DeVir. Your Mother Superior. Your tutor in Lady Shar's sacred arts.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes widen as the figure lowers their cowl off-screen. We then see who is revealed - a drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Jaheira
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_72.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_72.context: NodeContext: Response to Viconia's grand reveal. Viconia and Jaheira are legacy characters with a fractious relationship - it often flares up to outright hatred, but is right now sitting at distaste. The emphasis here is in reference to Shadowheart's memories of Viconia having been erased.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Minsc
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_60.text: You. Boo would have recognised your foul stench, had you not defiled his nose with evil Sharran incense!
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_60.context: NodeContext: Low, indignant - seeing Viconia DeVir again for the first time in years

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_3.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: Before me, you had no purpose in this world.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_73.text: Welcome home. Now descend to me - you have much to answer for.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: The artefact doesn't matter anymore. Not to me.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.text: What matters to you is but a grain of sand lost at the bottom of the deepest, darkest sea.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.text: You can. I made it so. But allow me to jog your memory...

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_68.text: My life was taken from me. I want it back.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_44.text: I want my lost memories restored.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.text: Loss is a gift. Do you still not understand? Clearly freedom has eroded my teachings.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.text: This can be remedied - if there is anything left of you that is worth saving.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Shadowheart
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_27.text: That voice... Do I know you?

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_46.text: More than you realise, girl. All you know comes from my tutelage. Before me, you were... you were of a very different stripe.

MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
MeetingViconia_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.text: How unsophisticated of you, girl. Could you have not at least attempted a lie? You always did possess a stubborn streak.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Welcome to the House of Grief... or perhaps 'welcome' is the wrong word, Shadowheart.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.text: There's been some debate whether you'd even show up and face the consequences of your actions. I assumed you'd try to flee, like a craven.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.text: You know me? Can't say the feeling's mutual. Maybe you're just forgettable.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_28.text: Do I know you? I like to be on a first-name basis before I give someone a thrashing, ideally.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_25.text: You haven't changed one bit, have you? I hope you remember it all, in the end. I want you to know how much of a failure you truly are.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.text: You were entrusted with a mission - at the Mother Superior's command, acting for Lady Shar herself.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: It seems you have failed them both, and yet you come here, brazen as anything. We will soon see what is to be done with you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_6.text: You think you are in a position to make demands? This is the Mother Superior's house, raised in Lady Shar's honour, for the pursuit of her greatness.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_16.text: Show respect - you can fall much, much farther if you try the Mother Superior's patience.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_14.text: First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart. Then we will see exactly how far you have strayed.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Simple questions, to help understand the shape of a person's heart - their desires, their fears... their failings.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_50.text: So, this must be where the Unburdening occurs... exactly what is that?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Freedom, from all that pains the spirit. We show those in suffering the wonder of Lady Shar's gift.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_52.text: But that is not why you are here. The Mother Superior awaits you, and you have much  to answer for.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_23.text: Do I know you? I like to be on a first-name basis before I give someone a thrashing, ideally.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_49.text: Welcome back - we've been awaiting you, Shadowheart.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.text: So the rumours are true then... the Dark Lady has blessed you. Most curious.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I know what this place really is... but I don't recall you. Were we acquainted?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: Perhaps, perhaps not - that depends on you. Lady Shar may honour you, but your memories are a privilege. Time will tell if you have earned them.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.text: You must submit to the Mapping of the Heart. Only then can we know if you have truly earned the glory the Nightsinger has bestowed upon you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.text: I need to see the Mother Superior.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_24.text: In due time. First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart - only then can we know what is to be done with you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.text: Lady Shar may smile upon you, but it is the Mother Superior who holds your fate in her hands.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_45.text: Follow me. The Mapping will reveal the path to you, if you are indeed worthy.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_17.text: So, this must be where the Unburdening occurs... exactly what is that?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.text: Freedom, from all that pains the spirit. But you know this already, even if you do not think you know it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.text: It will come back to you, in due time. First you must submit to the Mapping of the Heart - only then can we know what is to be done with you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.text: I met a man who'd been robbed of his memories - your handiwork?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.text: This is a place of healing. Anyone who partook in our methods did so willingly, and left with a smile on their face, freed from their troubles.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Mirie
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_11.text: Would you accuse a surgeon of robbing a tumour? I think not.
